Got the same issue with build I20070320-0010

BTW, failing to bind to default (3.3) presentation seems to cause various crashes in UI layer. For instance, trying to change the font colour for 'Active Part Foreground' caused the following exception:

For the record, I am using multiple window setup, in case this helps reproducing.
I finally managed to resolve the issue in my workspace by saving all open perspectives and restarting a few times (intermixed with switching the presentation between 3.0 and Default).
Fixed in HEAD...I no longer attempt to 'unzoom' anything when switching away from the 'default' perspective...
Released another fix so that an unknown presentation ID (e.g. the old .r33 ID) does not cause an AIOOBE like the one Philippe has seen.
